scripts.build-dev: npm run clean && env-cmd development,client webpack --progress --hide-modules
scripts.pack-dev: npm run clean && env-cmd development,client,pack webpack --progress --hide-modules && env-cmd development,client,pack node pack.js --android=../Things.Office.Android/app/src/main/assets/apps/H5/www --ios=../Things.Office.Ios/App/Pandora/apps/H5/www --update=../Things.Office.H5-update-packages
scripts.build-prod: npm run clean && env-cmd production,client webpack -p --progress --hide-modules
scripts.pack-prod: npm run clean && env-cmd production,client,pack webpack --progress --hide-modules -p && env-cmd production,client,pack node pack.js --android=../Things.Office.Android/app/src/main/assets/apps/H5/www --ios=../Things.Office.Ios/App/Pandora/apps/H5/www --update=../Things.Office.H5-update-packages
scripts.build-prod-debug: npm run clean && env-cmd production-debug,client webpack --progress --hide-modules
scripts.pack-prod-debug: npm run clean && env-cmd production-debug,client,pack webpack --progress --hide-modules && env-cmd production-debug,client,pack node pack.js --android=../Things.Office.Android/app/src/main/assets/apps/H5/www --ios=../Things.Office.Ios/App/Pandora/apps/H5/www --update=../Things.Office.H5-update-packages
